id: api/Deposit/Create Stripe payment with Saved Card for Deposit
title: Create Stripe payment with Saved Card for Deposit
description: The stripeForDepositWithSavedCard mutation allows a user to create a Stripe payment for a deposit into their wallet using a saved card.
